Class: InMap

InMap

new InMap(id, mapbox_id, options, options)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
id String id of the DOM element
mapbox_id String id of the mapbox map (eg example.123abc45)
options Object if options.position is an object, it's assuming that it's a marker and passed to addMarker
options Array if options is an array, it's assuming that it's an array of markers.
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 49

Methods

<static> parseMarker(opts)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
opts Array | Object either array with [lat,lng] position of marker or object with properties
Properties
Name Type Description
title String title to be shown in infowindow
description String description to be shown in infowindow
descriptionSelector String selector containing the description markup
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 157

addMarker()

Add a single marker to the map.
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 240
See:
  • InMap#parseMarker
Examples
inMap.addMarker([12, 34]);
inMap.addMarker({
    position: [12, 34],
    title: 'Foo Bar',
    description: 'Some Description'
});

addMarkers(markers)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
markers Array an array of markers passed to addMarker
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 363
Example
var markers = [{
    position: [12, 34],
    title: 'Foo Bar',
    description: 'Some Description'
}, {
    position: [56, 21],
    title: 'Foo Bar',
    description: 'Some Description'
}];
inMap.addMarkers(markers);

on()

Pipes the event handler through to leaflet's API
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 255
See:
  • http://leafletjs.com/reference.html#map-events
Example
inmap.on('zoomend', function (e) {
 console.log("zooming finished);
});

setZoom(position, options)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
position Array position in lat lng
options Object options passed to Leafletjs
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 441
See:
  • http://leafletjs.com/reference.html#map-zoompanoptions
Example
inMap.setZoom([53.10, 8]);

zoomAt(index)

Zoom to a specific marker that has been added before.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
index Integer the index of the marker to zoom at
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 478
Example
inmap.zoomAt(0);

zoomNext()

zoom to the next marker. Starting with 0.
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 535
Example
inmap.zoomNext();

zoomPrev()

zoom to the previous marker. Starting with the last one
Source:
  • jquery.inMap.js, line 555
Example
inmap.zoomPrev();
